name: Pranay Raj
position: Decision Analytics Associate @ ZS | IIT Kharagpur

current_company.name: ZS
current_company.title: Decision Analytics Associate @ ZS | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Decision Analytics Associate
experience.description: As a member of the ZS Medical Affairs division, I supported Medical Affairs teams across pharmaceutical companies in the following areas:Impact Tracking and Measurement:- Assisted a client in building key performance indicators (KPls) to track the impact generated by various field team initiatives- Created dashboards to provide clients with measurable metrics and visual representations of the impact achieved.Strategy Building and Execution:- Collaborated with pharma clients as part of a consulting team, offering insights and expertise on Integrated Evidence Planning for their Medical Affairs teams- Assisted in the creation of playbooks to guide clients in developing effective internal communication strategies related to product launches.Team Structure:- Conducted customer prioritization and segmentation for a US health system, determining the optimal team size for a new medical team focused on addressing unmet needs in a specific therapy area. Defined the team's role and responsibilities.- Designed the organizational structure and devised workload-based resource scenarios for an emerging pharmaceutical company. Carried out territory alignment to ensure optimal coverage of the company's customer base following an acquisition.
experience.description_html: As a member of the ZS Medical Affairs division, I supported Medical Affairs teams across pharmaceutical companies in the following areas:Impact Tracking and Measurement:- Assisted a client in building key performance indicators (KPls) to track the impact generated by various field team initiatives- Created dashboards to provide clients with measurable metrics and visual representations of the impact achieved.Strategy Building and Execution:- Collaborated with pharma clients as part of a consulting team, offering insights and expertise on Integrated Evidence Planning for their Medical Affairs teams- Assisted in the creation of playbooks to guide clients in developing effective internal communication strategies related to product launches.Team Structure:- Conducted customer prioritization and segmentation for a US health system, determining the optimal team size for a new medical team focused on addressing unmet needs in a specific therapy area. Defined the team's role and responsibilities.- Designed the organizational structure and devised workload-based resource scenarios for an emerging pharmaceutical company. Carried out territory alignment to ensure optimal coverage of the company's customer base following an acquisition.

experience.title: Product Management Intern

experience.title: Core Oraganising Team Member
